Blog About Stuff Colophon

You got DDD wrong

Mar 22, 2019 ITGM St.Petersburg, Russia

Sadly, a lot of people think that DDD is something about new clever patterns someone else invented.

My talk states that DDD is about your domain and your business logic. Invent any patterns you want! Or even invent your own.
